function.name: length_converter
function.description: Convert a length value from one unit to another

name: length_converter
short_description: Convert a length value from one unit to another.
long_description: Converts a length value from the specified source unit to the target unit using predefined conversion factors. Supported units include meters (m), kilometers (km), miles (mi), feet (ft), and inches (in).

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The length value to be converted

parameters.name: from_unit
parameters.description: The unit of the input length value (e.g., 'm', 'km', 'mi', 'ft', 'in')

parameters.name: to_unit
parameters.description: The unit to convert the length value to (e.g., 'm', 'km', 'mi', 'ft', 'in')

example_user_queries: How many miles are in 5 kilometers?
How many meters are in 3 miles?
How many kilometers are in 2000 meters?
How many feet are in 1 kilometer?
How many inches are in 10 feet?
